name: Forgotten Obelisk
description:
Fight waves of procedurally animated monsters in an arena where every voxel is

physically simulated. Master 5 weapons which can be customized through a randomly generated perk tree to better slice, melt, or explode your enemies into tiny cubes. Features fast-paced movement and ray-traced graphics.

Made for the 2022 7dfps game jam in a hand-crafted 3d falling sand engine.
